videos.title: Learn Html In Arabic #01 - Introduction and What is Html?
videos.description:
Introduction about the html language and information about how it start and why to learn it

Learn From The New Course
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6QAELgirvjs&list=PLDoPjvoNmBAw_t_XWUFbBX-c9MafPk9ji

videos.title: Learn Html In Arabic #02 - What I Need?
videos.description:
What I need to start learning Html plus some discussion about the language

For Komodo:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/ElzeroWebSchool/permalink/894503610678704/

videos.title: Learn Html In Arabic #03 - Attributes
videos.description: Explain everything about elements attributes and properties

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #04 - Heading
videos.description: Learn everything about Html Heading Elements and how to use it

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #05 - Paragraph
videos.description: Learn everything about paragraphs and how to deal with it

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #06 - Image
videos.description:
Learn everything about html image and how to add images to your webiste

Working with Paths when adding images
https://youtu.be/E6L-YWh7Y_g

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #07 - Anchor Link [ a ]
videos.description: Learn about the hypertext reference link, Anchor link [a]

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #08 - Head
videos.description:
Learn every element inside the head tag
meta charset
meta description
title
link
style
script

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #09 - Comments
videos.description: Learn about comments in Html and how it can help you in your work and explain the comment system in html and how to make comment

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #10 - Display: Block, Inline-Block, Inline
videos.description:
Explain everything about Block and Inline elements and whats the deference between Inline & Block although how to make div

and here is a full detailed video describe the deference between Inline & Block & inline-block
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sHAL9HNwziQ

and this is a good video on block element and how to use div 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ovNrBWl6zdU

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #11 - Lists - Ordered, Unordered, Description
videos.description:
Explain everything about Html lists
Unordered Lists
Ordered Lists
Description Lists

videos.title: Learn Html In Arabic #12 - Text Format Part 1
videos.description:
Explain the format of text elements and describe the following tags

(b) Bold text
(i) Italic text
(small) Small text
(strong) Strong text
(em) Emphasis text

videos.title: Learn Html In Arabic #13 - Text Format Part 2
videos.description:
Explain the format of text elements and describe the following tags

Blockquote
Q
Mark
Del
Ins
Sup
Sub

videos.title: Learn Html In Arabic #14 - Table Part 1 - Create a Simple Table
videos.description:
Learn everything about tables and its elements by creating a simple table and describe the following elements

Table: to create the table itself
Caption: to write the caption of the table
Tr: to make the table row
th: to make The table head
td: to make the table cell

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #15 - Table Part 2 - Create the Table Structure
videos.description:
Learn everything about tables and its elements by making the table structure and describe the following tags
thead: for creating top row of the table
tbody: for creating the body row of the table
tfoot: for creating the bottom row of the table

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #16 - Table Part 3 - Control the Table Columns
videos.description:
Learn everything about tables and its elements and how to control the columns and explain for this tags

Colspan
Rowspan
Colgroup
Col

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #17 - Elements Classes
videos.description: Learn how to assign a class to element so you can deal with it by css or javascript

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #18 - Form Elements Part 1
videos.description:
Learn about the form and all the elements you will use in form Part 1

label: for describing the field
Text: for adding text input
Password: for adding password field
Checkbox: for adding multi check field
Submit: button to submit data from form

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #19 - Form Elements Part 2
videos.description:
Learn about the form and all the elements you will use in form Part 2

Button: to send values and function by Javascript
File: to upload a file from your pc
Image: to add image to your field
Hidden: to store and send hidden values
Reset: to reset other fields 
Radio: to choose one elements from choices

Difference between Name & Value
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Eis4EANPZYQ

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #20 - Form Elements Part 3
videos.description:
Learn about the form and all the elements you will use in form Part 3
textarea: a large text area field to write big messages
fieldset: a container for multi fields
legend: the title of the fieldset
select: dropdown select field
option: the option of the dropdown select

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #21 - Training - Create a Nice Form
videos.description: Learn to create a nice form as a training on what you learned from previous lessons

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #22 - iFrame
videos.description: Learn about iFrame and how to include any website to your page

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #23 - Html Entities & Reserved Characters
videos.description: Learn about the entities and the reserved characters in Html

videos.title: Learn Html in Arabic #24 - Training - Create a Simple Layout
videos.description: Create a simple layout as a training for what you learned in the course
